1.label: Lifeline
1.description: This group is normally automatically assigned to the Z-Wave system controller when EZMultiPli is added to the ZWave network.

2.label: Basic
2.description: This group is used to directly turn lights on or off when motion is detected.

2.label: Dim Level
2.description: Sets the dim level; -1 for full on

3.label: Light Level Report Interval
3.description: Sets the interval for light level reports; 0 to disable

4.label: Temperature Report Interval
4.description: Sets the interval for temp level reports; 0 to disable
